input_args.passage: "Mariaan de Swardt - Wikipedia | De Swardt won two Grand Slam titles in mixed-doubles competition, the 1999 Australian Open and the 2000 French Open with partner David Adams. She also won four women's doubles titles and reached as high as world No. 11 in the doubles WTA rankings."
input_args.claim: 'Source also mentions that Serena has won four Olympic gold medals and two in mixed doubles.'
